paragraphs.title: CREATE HIVE TABLE sales FROM LOCAL CSV
STORE HIVE TABLE sales AS CSV sales.csv in HDFS
paragraphs.text:
%sh
hadoop fs -rm /user/zeppelin/sales.csv || true
hive -e 'set hive.cli.print.header=true;set hive.resultset.use.unique.column.names=false;select * from sales;' | sed 's/[[:space:]]\+/,/g' > /tmp/salesSED.csv
hdfs dfs -put /tmp/salesSED.csv /user/zeppelin/sales.csv

paragraphs.title: PUSH sales.csv FILE TO OBJECT STORAGE
paragraphs.text:
%sh
# Replace<Your OCI Bucket Name> and <Your Cloud Account Identity Domain> in  "oci://<Your OCI Bucket Name>@<Your Cloud Account Identity Domain>/sales.csv"
hadoop fs -cp -f '/user/zeppelin/sales.csv' oci://BDC@gse00014528/sales.csv # Put "sales.csv" in HDFS to Object Storage
